Description: Rim and handle fragment of Attic black-figure painted pottery kotyle. Double ivy-leaf chain below rim; palmette beneath handle. Purple on base and central leaf of palmette.
Curator's comments: Accompanying label states: "Fragment of kotyle. Attic. About 540BC. Found at Tell Defenneh. CV8 pl.100,29".
Bibliographic references: CVA British Museum 8 / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum: Great Britain 13, British Museum 8 (Pl. GB 608, 29)
Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 85)
Leclère and Spencer 2014 / Tell Dafana Reconsidered: The Archaeology of an Egyptian Frontier Town (p.119, p.120, fig.4)
